title: Philip Seymour Hoffman Leaves Indelible Bond In 'Most Wanted Man'
teaser: The late actor hit his peak in the adaptation of John le Carre's 2008 novel. The movie isn't a clean piece of storytelling, but Hoffman connects with viewers on a level most actors never approach.
